Class SavingsAccount

java.lang.Object
Account
SavingsAccount
public class SavingsAccount
extends Account

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private double interest
    used to store the interest rate in decimal form (so a 5% interest rate would be .05)
    private static int numOfSavingsAccounts
    store the number of savings accounts that have been created so far

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    SavingsAccount​(double balance, int accountNumber, java.lang.String accountHolder, double interest)
    constructor for savings account, the account type should always be individual

  • Constructor Details

    • SavingsAccount

      public SavingsAccount​(double balance, int accountNumber, java.lang.String accountHolder, double interest)
      constructor for savings account, the account type should always be individual
      Parameters:
      balance - initial balance
      accountNumber -
      accountHolder - name of the account holder
      interest - interest rate in decimal form (so a 5% interest rate would be .05)
